page.title: 05Price Comparisons 1959-1985
page.content:
(Page supplied by C M Primary School) Mrs,Yeo,the dinner lady,lent us a book of prices for 1959 so we went round some shops in C M to compare the prices of 60 items then and now. Here is a small sample. The 1959 prices are in old money (i.e. 240 old pence to the #1. 12d to a shilling).
1 drum table salt now 24p was 1s 3d 1 pk Shredded Wheat now 76p was 1s 3d 1 bot.Daddies Sauce now 40p was 1s 0d 1 tin Brasso now 98p was 1s 4d 1 tin Baked beans now 76p was 2s 8p 1 Pkt flour now 57p was 1s 10p 1 dozen eggs now 76p was 3s 0p 2 toilet rolls now 68p was 1s 0p Cost of 60 items now #24.10 was #7 17s
Weekly wage now #100.00 was #8 10s Percentage of wages spent on food now 25% was 90%
